### <a name="perforce_helix--broker"></a>`perforce_helix::broker`

manage helix broker

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `perforce_helix::broker` class:

* [`packages`](#-perforce_helix--broker--packages)
* [`ensure`](#-perforce_helix--broker--ensure)

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--broker--packages"></a>`packages`

Data type: `Variant[Array,Array[String]]`

set empty array to disable package management

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--broker--ensure"></a>`ensure`

Data type: `Variant[Enum['installed', 'absent', 'latest']]`

value of package ensure parameter

### <a name="perforce_helix--repository--apt"></a>`perforce_helix::repository::apt`

install perforce apt source

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `perforce_helix::repository::apt` class:

* [`ensure`](#-perforce_helix--repository--apt--ensure)
* [`location`](#-perforce_helix--repository--apt--location)
* [`gpg_key`](#-perforce_helix--repository--apt--gpg_key)
* [`gpg_keyring`](#-perforce_helix--repository--apt--gpg_keyring)

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--repository--apt--ensure"></a>`ensure`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`



Default value: `'present'`

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--repository--apt--location"></a>`location`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `'https://package.perforce.com/apt/ubuntu'`

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--repository--apt--gpg_key"></a>`gpg_key`

Data type: `String`



##### <a name="-perforce_helix--repository--apt--gpg_keyring"></a>`gpg_keyring`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `'/etc/apt/keyrings/perforce.asc'`

### <a name="perforce_helix--repository--yum"></a>`perforce_helix::repository::yum`

install perforce yum repository

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `perforce_helix::repository::yum` class:

* [`ensure`](#-perforce_helix--repository--yum--ensure)
* [`gpg_key`](#-perforce_helix--repository--yum--gpg_key)
* [`gpg_keyring`](#-perforce_helix--repository--yum--gpg_keyring)
* [`baseurl`](#-perforce_helix--repository--yum--baseurl)

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--repository--yum--ensure"></a>`ensure`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`



Default value: `'present'`

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--repository--yum--gpg_key"></a>`gpg_key`

Data type: `String`



##### <a name="-perforce_helix--repository--yum--gpg_keyring"></a>`gpg_keyring`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `'/etc/pki/rpm-gpg/RPM-GPG-KEY-perforce'`

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--repository--yum--baseurl"></a>`baseurl`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `"https://package.perforce.com/yum/rhel/${facts.get('os.release.major').downcase}/${facts.get('os.architecture')}"`

## Defined types

### <a name="perforce_helix--p4d--configure"></a>`perforce_helix::p4d::configure`

configure a p4d server instance

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `perforce_helix::p4d::configure` defined type:

* [`instance`](#-perforce_helix--p4d--configure--instance)
* [`ssl`](#-perforce_helix--p4d--configure--ssl)

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--p4d--configure--instance"></a>`instance`

Data type: `Pattern[/^([A-z0-9]+):(\d+)$/]`

format as name:port

Default value: `$title`

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--p4d--configure--ssl"></a>`ssl`

Data type: `Boolean`

enable built-in ssl support

Default value: `false`

### <a name="perforce_helix--p4d--server"></a>`perforce_helix::p4d::server`

an instance of a p4d server

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `perforce_helix::p4d::server` defined type:

* [`root`](#-perforce_helix--p4d--server--root)
* [`instance`](#-perforce_helix--p4d--server--instance)
* [`ssl`](#-perforce_helix--p4d--server--ssl)
* [`auditlog`](#-perforce_helix--p4d--server--auditlog)
* [`auth`](#-perforce_helix--p4d--server--auth)
* [`change`](#-perforce_helix--p4d--server--change)
* [`description`](#-perforce_helix--p4d--server--description)
* [`journal`](#-perforce_helix--p4d--server--journal)
* [`log`](#-perforce_helix--p4d--server--log)
* [`loginsso`](#-perforce_helix--p4d--server--loginsso)
* [`target`](#-perforce_helix--p4d--server--target)

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--p4d--server--root"></a>`root`

Data type: `Stdlib::AbsolutePath`

directory

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--p4d--server--instance"></a>`instance`

Data type: `Pattern[/^([A-z0-9]+):(\d+)$/]`

format as name:port

Default value: `$title`

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--p4d--server--ssl"></a>`ssl`

Data type: `Boolean`

enable built-in ssl support

Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--p4d--server--auditlog"></a>`auditlog`

Data type: `Optional[Stdlib::AbsolutePath]`

path to audit log

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--p4d--server--auth"></a>`auth`

Data type: `Optional[Variant[Stdlib::Port,Pattern[/^\w+:\d+$/]]]`

port or host:port of centralized auth server

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--p4d--server--change"></a>`change`

Data type: `Optional[Variant[Stdlib::Port,Pattern[/^\w+:\d+$/]]]`

port or host:port of centralized changelist server

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--p4d--server--description"></a>`description`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

description to help identify servers

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--p4d--server--journal"></a>`journal`

Data type: `Optional[Stdlib::AbsolutePath]`

path to journal

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--p4d--server--log"></a>`log`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

name or path to where server errors are written

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--p4d--server--loginsso"></a>`loginsso`

Data type: `Optional[Stdlib::AbsolutePath]`

client-side single sign-on script

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-perforce_helix--p4d--server--target"></a>`target`

Data type: `Optional[Variant[Stdlib::Port,Pattern[/^\w+:\d+$/]]]`

for replica or edge server, the upstream master or commit server from which it retrieves its data

Default value: `undef`
